job_description:
MARS Solutions Group is looking for a Senior Data Scientist

for a client. Our client is a well-known and highly respected organization seeking bright, tech-savvy talent.

Description:

As a Senior Data Scientist in this role, you will work as the primary modeler for our in-house Marketing Attribution (MMM) and Optimization model. You will be responsible for ensuring input data fidelity, and producing results that are statistically sound. In addition to your primary function, you will work with Principal Data Scientists to research and implement econometric/statistical and mathematical optimization solutions to strengthen and enhance the Attribution and Optimization model.

You will work with Data Engineers, Machine Learning Engineers, and Front-End Designers/Developers to ensure quality of data and results and debug errors as necessary. The Senior Data Scientist is expected to be a strong team-player and take on a player-coach role within the team. You must possess the desire to: (1) train junior data scientists on modeling procedure; (2) coach junior data scientists on understanding, shaping, and validating data; (3) ensure requirements are met or communicate roadblocks; and (4) train junior data scientists to execute, tune, and validate the model.

What you will do:
• Independently execute the Attribution and Optimization model balancing accuracy
• Communicate and translate results in the context of the business and quantify uncertainty
• Help Decision Scientists, Business Analysts, and Data Science leadership recommend strategies and operational tactics under uncertainty
• Develop compelling measurement plans and model/forecast scoring methods to track predictions against actuals (while considering the cumulative and delayed effects of marketing efforts and uncertainty)
• Design, develop and program methods, processes, and systems to consolidate and analyze unstructured, diverse "big data" sources to generate actionable insights and solutions to generate business impact
• Work across multi-disciplinary teams to translate business needs into testable hypotheses and design experiments to test said hypotheses
• Collaborate with other members of the team to support investigation across a variety of topics
• Research, recommend, and apply appropriate statistical, econometric, mathematical, and computational modeling concepts across domains
• Work with Machine Learning Engineers to convert experimental code to production code
• Unit test production model code to ensure quality
• Take an active role in recruiting, training, guiding, and mentoring junior team members
• Ensure data and code integrity by conducting documentation and code reviews
• Implement strategic analyses with the know-how to balance getting the details right, while still moving at the speed of business

You have:
• A quantitative MS/PhD and minimum of 3 years of demonstrated success in Data Science
• 3 years of experience in deploying data science in a business environment and fact-based evidence/anecdotes of implementation and impact from such deployments
• Experience in Time Series modeling and the complexity of Time Series
• Expertise in Bayesian modeling and Bayesian inference
• An understanding of uncertainty principles in modeling and leverage distributional predictions to represent uncertainty and risk
• The ability to accurately scope modeling projects and estimate levels of effort in sprint planning
• Collaboration skills and experience working with cross-functional teams and effectively communicate findings and recommendations to non-technical stakeholders
• A team-player and a team-first mentality
• Excellent oral and written communication skills
• Excellent Data Story telling skills
• A highly detail-oriented and organized working style-ensuring model documentation excellence
• Strong business, economic, and financial acumen

You will stand out if you have one or more of the following:
• The ability to quantify indirect effect of treatments utilizing Bayesian/Causal Networks or Halo Effects
• Experience with Bayesian Belief Networks
• Experience incorporating expert qualitative business knowledge and A/B test results to adjust and tune model results
• Familiarity and experience with conformal prediction, and diffusion methods is a plus
• Demonstrated experience with applying integer and linear optimization methods to drive business goals/KPI outcomes
• Strong working knowledge of causal inference techniques
• Familiarity of advanced optimization methods
• Demonstrated success in Data Science within the Marketing Domain
• Experience working in CPG, Media, or Retail on the client or agency side
• Domain knowledge on marketing and/or Market Mix Models
• Up to date and passion for staying current with various modeling techniques and a demonstrated history of utilizing champion challenger principles to ensure model
• 2 years of demonstrated experience working directly or indirectly with Python in a full-stack Data Science product environment
• Experience working with engineers to convert prototype code into production ready code
• Experience working with Bit Bucket, Git, Google Cloud Platform
• Experience working in an agile setting and the familiarity of agile principles

MARS Solutions Group is an IT staffing firm with access to a wide variety of jobs at various clients across the country. We operate with the consultant's best interests in mind and align them with roles that match their skills, aspirations, and interests.

MARS values our relationships with consultants. Therefore, we will stay in touch throughout the duration of the contract to ensure the job is going well and that the role meets their career development needs.

Qualifications: A quantitative MS/PhD and minimum of 3 years of demonstrated success in Data Science
3 years of experience in deploying data science in a business environment and fact-based evidence/anecdotes of implementation and impact from such deployments
Experience in Time Series modeling and the complexity of Time Series

Demonstrated experience with applying integer and linear optimization methods to drive business goals/KPI outcomes
Strong working knowledge of causal inference techniques
Familiarity of advanced optimization methods

Experience working in CPG, Media, or Retail on the client or agency side
Domain knowledge on marketing and/or Market Mix Models
Up to date and passion for staying current with various modeling techniques and a demonstrated history of utilizing champion challenger principles to ensure model
2 years of demonstrated experience working directly or indirectly with Python in a full-stack Data Science product environment
Experience working with engineers to convert prototype code into production ready code

Experience working in an agile setting and the familiarity of agile principles
